cui_name: Transient Myeloproliferative Disorder of Down Syndrome
reasoning: Transient myeloproliferative disorder (TMD) occurs in ~3-10% of Down syndrome newborns globally. With ~1 per 1000 Down syndrome births (~80,000 annually), estimated ~1.2 per 100k general population. Limited but emerging epidemiological data from pediatric hematology literature.
